channel.title: Advanced-features on Martian
channel.description: Recent content in Advanced-features on Martian

item.title: Advanced Features
item.description: Martian supports a number of advanced features to provide: Performance and resource efficiency that scales from single servers to large high-performance compute clusters Early error detection Data storage efficiency Loosely-coupled integration with other systems Parallelization [ WIP ] Job Management Local Mode Cluster Mode Templates Throttling Preflight Checks Volatile Data Removal volatile keyword. Parameter Sweeping Performance Analysis Completion Hooks path to pipestance {complete|failed} pipestance ID path to error file (if there was an error) mrp Options The rest are described here:
